data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yasunaga, Tomohide, Yamada, Kazutaka, Tsai, Jing-Fu (2017): Taxonomic review of the plant bug subfamily Isometopinae for Taiwan and Japanese Southwest Islands, with descriptions of new taxa (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Miridae: Isometopinae). Zootaxa 4365 (4): 421-439, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4365.4.3|22 occurrences
